settings.title: Vision to Reality
settings.text:
At Apricoat, we are a passionate group of international explorers on a mission to create the ultimate high-quality, innovative, and sustainable adventure traveling gear. 

We have started our way through extensive research, industry consultations, years of product designs, and rigorous testing, we have perfected our products to offer unparalleled excellence.

Our crowdfunding campaign, supported by over 20,000 backers, has raised more than $2 million, turning our vision of life-lasting eco-friendly traveling gear into a bright reality.

settings.title: Backers as partners
settings.text: Every traveler who has believed in our vision and invested in our products has become a partner in our journey. Their support enables us to create the ultimate traveling gear that meets and exceeds expectations. Together, we are pushing the boundaries of what is possible in outdoor clothing, constantly innovating to ensure the best traveling experience in any weather.

settings.title: Dreams and Growth
settings.text: As a company, we are growing at a remarkable pace. Our commitment to excellence and our unwavering dedication to providing exceptional gear have garnered the attention and loyalty of outdoor enthusiasts worldwide. We are excited about the opportunities that lie ahead as we expand our reach and continue to develop new products that enhance your adventures.

settings.title: Apricoat Family
settings.text:
If you share our love for the outdoors and have a passion for startups, Apricoat might just be the dream place for you. We invite you to explore our open positions and join us in creating a world where exceptional gear meets sustainable practices, enabling unforgettable adventures for all. Together, we can make a difference in the world and shape the future of traveling gear

Go to Careers >

settings.title: Sustainable, High-end gear to endless opportunities.
IntuPockets™
settings.text:
Keep all your gear accessible and dry and get
to all your pockets easily without overstretching
or making too big of an effort. Comfort and
convenience when exploring are possible!

settings.title: BackBreeze™
settings.text:
When you work up a sweat, our innovative ventilation
system has your back. The Down Jacket’s upper
back slit opens to circulate the air. Extra slits under
the arms keep everything easy breezy.

settings.title: RuggedDown™
settings.text: Our Down Jacket features RipStop fabric made to prevent unwanted rips and tears, and reinforced shoulders stand up to harsh conditions or heavy backpacks.

settings.title: DWD™
settings.text: Stands for Differential Weight Distribution. Our patented technology means you can carry more items with you, without feeling like your jacket is overloaded. Life is all about balance.

settings.title: HydraBack™
settings.text: We even added a smart compartment for your hydration pack so you can drink up when you’re thirsty. It fits perfectly in the jacket design so you don't even realize it’s there.

settings.title: Recycled
settings.text: Our products are all made from quality recycled materials to last a lifetime while making our planet a better, greener, healthier place.

settings.title: We'd love to hear from you
settings.text: New ideas, sustainable solutions, careers or any question you have got in mind, feel free to contact us. We are always happy to chat with adventures travelers.
